snippet: The D.J., known as Dave Lee Travis, 68, was charged with indecent assault and sexual assault in relation to offenses that were said to have occurred over 30 years.
abstract: Dave Lee Travis, British disc jockey whose real name is David Patrick Griffin, is charged with 11 counts of indecent assault and one count of sexual assault, for offenses that are said to have occurred over a period of 30 years.
lead_paragraph: The D.J., known as Dave Lee Travis, 68, was charged with indecent assault and sexual assault in relation to offenses that were said to have occurred over 30 years.

headline.main: Britain: D.J. Is Charged With Sexual Assault
